summary: SkY[iNi] is a tool to quickly apply settings to the Skyrim.ini and SkyrimPrefs.ini, just like MoRRoWiNi does.
descriptionHtml:
If you have a bunch of mods that requires custom ini settings it can be annoying to edit the ini file(s) manually. SkY[iNi] works like MoRRoWiNi and applies automatically all these settings for you.

[B]Usage:[/B]
- create a text file and open it
- use this section to provide some infos about these settings
-> File="", only could be "Skyrim.ini" or "SkyrimPrefs.ini" and must be specified

[TIP]
Mod=""
Desc=""
Author=""
File=""

- add your settings (for Example)

[Display]
iShadowMapResolutionPrimary=2048
[Grass]
iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure=6

- save the file as "*.tip" file
- put the file in the same directory as SkY[iNi].exe and start SkY[iNi].exe
- apply settings
-> by "mouse double click" or
-> mark a entry by "Ctrl + left mouse button" and click apply
-> Note: this alows you to bring multiple patches in an installorder, to deselect a selected entry use "Ctrl + right mouse button"

that's it.

[B]Requirements:[/B]
- Microsoft .NET Framework 4 Client Profile
author: Sonne170
